name: Rubber Duck Love
description:
A Unity game made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2017

Unite the ducks by throwing pebbles and creating ripples in the pond. Avoid challenging obstacles such as floating rocks, an RC toy boat, and sea mines. Sit back and watch the waves move across the surface of that awesome 2d water physics shader. Guide the rubber duck to her lonesome lover, but don't run out of rocks! Keep the love alive in Rubber Duck Love!

Platforms: MS Windows, Mac OS X, Linux / UnixTools And Technologies: Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: Gamepad supported

Installation Instructions: Click to run the .exe file.

Credits:

Billy Manning - Waterbender (graphics code)

Chris Foster - Rock Chucker (gameplay code)

Julia Wlochowski - Mess Maker (art & animation)

Adam Cardoza - Noisy Person (sound & code)
